'''''Mythlore'' 51''' ([https://dc.swosu.edu/mythlore/vol14/iss1/ Volume 14, Issue 1]) is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]].

==Contents==

====Articles====

* Evans, Robley. “Tolkien's World-Creation: Degenerative Recurrence.”
* Couch, Christopher L. “From Under Mountains to Beyond Stars: The Process of Riddling in Leofric's The Exeter Book and The Hobbit.”
* Huttar, Charles. “Seeing Williams' Work as a Whole: Church Year and Creed as Structural Principles.”
* Hyde, Paul Nolan. “J.R.R. Tolkien: Creative Uses of the Oxford English Dictionary.”
* King, Don. “The Wardrobe as Christian Metaphor.”
* Hammond, Wayne G. “All the Comforts: The Image of Home in The Hobbit & The Lord of the Rings.”
* Loback, Tom. “The Kindreds, Houses & Population of the Elves during the First Age.”
* Thompson, George H. “Minor, Early References to Tolkien and His Works.”
* Cobb, Lawrence W. “Courtly Love in The Allegory.”
* Irwin, Betty J. “Archaic Pronouns in The Lord of the Rings.”
* Robert, Higbie and Joe E. Bryan Jr. “Frodo and Childe Roland.”
* Reynolds, Patrica. “An Index to Mythlore, Issues 1 to 50.

====Features====

* GoodKnight, Glen. Editorial: Some Other Anniversaries.
* Kondratiev, Alexei. “Tales Newly Told.”
* Letters.
* GoodKnight, Glen. “Founder's Thoughts ‘On the Journey.’”
* The Council of Stewards.
